overview: From 2025-08-20 to 2025-08-21, ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add Pepe Community (PEPE) token for Ethereum → Base bridge
topPRs.author: xxDTECHxx
topPRs.body:
This PR adds the Pepe Community ($PEPE) token to the Superchain Token List for Ethereum and Base.

L1 Address: 0xbe042e9d09cb588331ff911c2b46fd833a3e5bd6
L2 Address (Base): 0xb5068ad7e4ad8f7fe2fcf5abe2c043ab8866569c
Project Name: Pepe Community
Symbol: PEPE
Decimals: 18
Website: https://pepecommunity.vip/
Token logo included as logo.svg

 @fainashalts

topContributors.summary: xxDTECHxx: Focused on expanding token support, successfully merging PR #1188 in ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io to add the Pepe Community (PEPE) token for the Ethereum → Base bridge, demonstrating a primary focus on configuration changes.
killers10: Focused on configuration work, opening one PR, ethereum-optimism/docs#1720, to create a new npm-gulp.yml file, which involved modifying 2 files with 56 additions.
tessr: Focused on foundational work for usage metrics, evidenced by the creation of an issue in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#17164) to report op-up usage metrics.
scagria: Focused on other work, making 3 commits that modified 7 files with a net change of +91 lines, and provided 1 PR comment.
Wazabie: Focused on tests work, modifying 7 files (+123/-41 lines) and providing 1 PR comment, indicating a primary focus on code quality and testing.
